projectDialog.description: The platform will exclusively present information relevant to the projects you select.

legalInfo.title: Information according to ยง 5 TMG

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The content of our website has been created with great care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the content.
disclaimer.links: Our site contains links to external websites. We have no influence on the content of those sites and therefore cannot assume liability for them.

copyright.title: Copyright Notice
copyright.content: All content and works on this website are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, editing, distribution, or any kind of use beyond the scope of copyright law requires the prior written consent of the respective author or creator.

dispute.title: Dispute Resolution
dispute.content: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR):
dispute.note: We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

glance.title: 1. Data Protection at a Glance
glance.p1: We take the protection of your personal data very seriously. All personal information will be handled confidentially and in accordance with statutory data protection regulations (GDPR).
glance.p2: The use of our website is generally possible without providing personal data. Where personal data is collected, this is always done on a voluntary basis whenever possible.

serverLogs.title: Server Log Files
serverLogs.p: Our Go backend automatically collects and stores information in server log files that your browser transmits to us, including:

cookies.title: Cookies (js-cookie)
cookies.p: Our website uses cookies via js-cookie to enhance user experience. These include:
cookies.notice: You can configure your browser to refuse cookies, though this may limit functionality.

storage.title: 3. Data Storage & Processing
storage.p1: Personal data is stored in our PostgreSQL database with the following safeguards:
items: Encryption at rest and in transit
storage.p2: Client-side state management uses Zustand, which stores non-sensitive UI state locally in the browser.

rights.title: 4. Your Rights
rights.p1: Under GDPR, you have the right to:
items: Request access to your personal data
Lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@yourcompany.com.

thirdParties.title: 5. Third-Party Services
thirdParties.p: We may integrate with third-party services that process data under their own privacy policies. These include:

changes.title: 6. Changes to This Policy
changes.p1: We may update this policy periodically. Significant changes will be announced via our website or email notification.
